alert.note: Alert for Lyon; Morris (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 24 at 4:26PM CDT by NWS Topeka
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Morris and Lyon Counties through 500 PM CDT... At 425 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Admire to 4 miles south of Americus to 3 miles west of Olpe. Movement was north-northwest at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Emporia, Americus, Olpe, Allen, Admire, Bushong and Dunlap. This includes the following highways... Interstate 35 between mile markers 128 and 134. Kansas Turnpike between mile markers 117 and 142. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
